sub_module.name: egr_pointed
sub_module.doc: Virtual egress objects which do not access GLEM

define.name: first_egr_pointed_id
define.doc: Identifier of very first virtual egress pointed object. Range is from 'first_egr_pointed_id' to 'nof_egr_pointed_ids - 1'

numeric.name: nof_egr_pointed_ids
numeric.doc: Number of virtual egress pointed object ids

numeric.name: nof_bits_in_egr_pointed_id
numeric.doc: Number of bits representing one virtual egress pointed object id

define.name: nof_fecs
define.doc: The maximal number of FECs supported by the device.

define.name: max_fec_id_for_single_dhb_cluster_pair_granularity
define.doc: The maximal FEC ID that support a single DHB cluasters pair.

define.name: max_fec_id_for_double_dhb_cluster_pair_granularity
define.doc: The maximal FEC ID that requiere an even number of DHB clusters pairs.

define.name: max_default_fec
define.doc: The maximal FEC id that can be used for default route.

define.name: bank_size
define.doc: The smallest number of FECs which belong to the same hierarchy

define.name: bank_size_round_up
define.doc: In some cases FEC bank size contains extra FECs due to round up which results from physical to logical translation

define.name: max_nof_super_fecs_per_bank
define.doc: The max NOF SUPER FEC IDs per resource manager bank.

define.name: nof_physical_fecs_per_bank
define.doc: The number of physical FEC IDs per bank.

define.name: super_fec_size
define.doc: The number of bits of a single super FEC in the MDB.

define.name: max_nof_banks
define.doc: The maximal NOF possible banks in the device (not MDB profile dependent).

define.name: first_bank_without_id_alloc
define.doc: the first fec allocation bank that can be used for allocating FECs without an ID

define.name: max_super_fec_id
define.doc: The max ID of the super FEC

define.name: fer_mdb_granularity_ratio
define.doc: This value indicate the ratio between the FER FEC granularity relative to the MDB

define.name: source_address_table_size
define.doc: The number of entries in the source address table.

define.name: custom_sa_use_dual_homing
define.doc: Indication whether ARP custom sa feature is using EEDB dual homing field or full mac address from source address table.

define.name: nof_vrf
define.doc: The maximal number of VRFs supported by the device.

define.name: nof_vrf_ipv6
define.doc: The maximal number of VRFs supported by the device for an IPv6 MC table.

define.name: nof_routing_enablers_profiles
define.doc: The maximal number of references for a routing enablers vector.

define.name: max_nof_rifs
define.doc: Maximum number of rifs supported by the device.

numeric.name: nof_rifs
numeric.doc: Number of rifs available in the system.

define.name: flp_fragment_support
define.doc: Indicate whether the LB fragmentation is handled by the FLP.

define.name: max_mc_group_lpm
define.doc: The maximum number of MC group ID for IPMC route entries.

define.name: max_mc_group_em
define.doc: The maximum number of MC group ID for IPMC host entries.

define.name: nof_my_mac_prefixes
define.doc: The number of my MACs prefixes.

define.name: compressed_sip_svl_size
define.doc: The size in bits of the IPMC IP6 compressed SIP for SVL table

define.name: nof_compressed_svl_sip
define.doc: Number of supported IPMC compressed SIPs.

define.name: group_size_nof_bits
define.doc: The NOF bit of the group size field.

define.name: max_group_size
define.doc: The maximal size of an ECMP group.

define.name: nof_ecmp_per_bank_of_low_ecmps
define.doc: The low 32k ECMP are placed in a memory of 16 banks, each bank holds 2k ECMPS.

define.name: nof_ecmp_basic_mode
define.doc: Number of ECMP groups that can be created in basic mode as opposed to extended mode

define.name: total_nof_ecmp
define.doc: The total number of IDs that are considered to be in the ECMP range.

define.name: max_ecmp_basic_mode
define.doc: Maximum ECMP group ID that can be created in basic mode as opposed to extended mode

define.name: max_ecmp_extended_mode
define.doc: Maximum ECMP group ID that can be created in extended mode

define.name: nof_ecmp_per_bank_of_extended_ecmps
define.doc: The upper 8k ECMP (from 32k to 40k) are placed in a memory of 16 banks, each bank holds 512 ECMPS.

define.name: nof_fec_banks_per_extended_ecmp_bank
define.doc: nof fec protection banks to be used for 1 ecmp extended bank

define.name: nof_group_profiles_per_hierarchy
define.doc: Number of profiles that are available for each ECMP hierarchy.

define.name: members_table_size_in_bits
define.doc: The available space for the members table in bits.

define.name: ecmp_stage_map_size
define.doc: The smallest number of consecutive ECMP groups which belong to the same hierarchy

define.name: nof_ecmp_banks_basic
define.doc: The number of ECMP banks in the basic range of IDs.

define.name: nof_ecmp_banks_extended
define.doc: The number of ECMP banks in the extended range of IDs.

define.name: first_valid_ecmp_group_id
define.doc: The ID of the first valid ECMP group which can be created

define.name: nof_ecmp
define.doc: Number of ECMPs in the system.

define.name: max_nof_fec_ecmp_tables
define.doc: Maximum number of ECMP FEC tables

define.name: profile_id_size
define.doc: The size of the profile ID field

define.name: profile_id_offset
define.doc: The offset of the profile ID field

define.name: member_table_row_width
define.doc: The width in bits of a row in the ECMP member table.

define.name: tunnel_priority_support
define.doc: Device has tunnel priority support.

define.name: nof_tunnel_priority_map_profiles
define.doc: The NOF tunnle priority map profiles

define.name: tunnel_priority_field_width
define.doc: The width in bits of the tunnel priority field.

define.name: tunnel_priority_index_field_width
define.doc: The size of the possible TP indexes field.

define.name: nof_mymac_prefixes
define.doc: Number of mymac prefixes

define.name: nof_protocol_groups
define.doc: Number of L3 protocol groups

define.name: nof_tcam_entries
define.doc: Size of VRRP TCAM table

define.name: nof_vsi_tcam_entries
define.doc: Number of enries in VRRP TCAM table that can be used by VSI table

define.name: exem_vrid_ipv4_tcam_index
define.doc: TCAM index for EXEM VRRP VRID IPv4 protocol

define.name: exem_vrid_ipv6_tcam_index
define.doc: TCAM index for EXEM VRRP VRID IPv6 protocol

define.name: exem_default_tcam_index
define.doc: TCAM index for EXEM VSI LSB or SOURCE-PORT multiple my mac

define.name: exem_default_tcam_index_msb
define.doc: TCAM index for EXEM VSI MSB multiple my mac

feature.name: ipv6_mc_compatible_dmac
feature.doc: IPv6 compatible MC destination MAC is considered UC

feature.name: fec_hit_bit
feature.doc: Hit bit retrieval for FEC is not supported.

feature.name: fer_fec_granularity_double_size
feature.doc: The FER granularity is double the size of the MDB granularity.

feature.name: mc_bridge_fallback
feature.doc: Multicast bridge fallback is not supported.
